F1 on linux-motif and w2k:

Got an NPE in log but not in a dialog:

  1) File Search for *.java files
  2) Select a result element and select 'Replace Selected...'
  3) Type in some text.
  4) Hit replace.
  5) Observe an NPE entry in the log.
